snippet: The mayor of Richmond, Va., announced plans to build a minor-league baseball park near the site of a slave market and cemetery, prompting an outcry over what protesters said would be desecration of the area.
lead_paragraph: The mayor of Richmond, Va., announced plans to build a minor-league baseball park near the site of a slave market and cemetery, prompting an outcry over what protesters said would be desecration of the area.

headline.main: Virginia: Ballpark Sought Near Site of Slave Market
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Ballpark Sought On Site of Slave Market
